projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.blurb: Reading happy thoughts from an API and allowing user to submit happy thoughts to the API and displaying the recently submitted thought.

projects.name: Quiz
projects.blurb: A quiz using different types of questions. Created during mental health awareness month which was the inspiration for the questions.

projects.name: Online CV
projects.blurb: Created a page for my worklife experience. The header changes depending on the time of day. At the bottom links to projects built is present.

projects.name: Photography page
projects.blurb: Built a page for my sidehobby which is photography. The Site is pulling in photos I took which are uploaded on Unsplash and pulled into the page using their API.

projects.name: Input Converter
projects.blurb: A converter that formats data to be comma separated and multiple words wrapped in quotes. Paste from excel to the input and click convert to format.

projects.name: Business site
projects.blurb: Form allowing you to submit your details and what your next knitting project will be along with your name and details. Upon submit it is sent to httpbin.

projects.name: Pizzabot
projects.blurb: Using JavaScript, creating prompts for the user to select their order and continue to the flow with the relevant options pending previous choices made.

projects.name: Library
projects.blurb: Library of recepies built using HTML, CSS and Javascript. The page includes options to filter based on cuisine and time it takes to cook the dish.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.blurb: Using a weather API to display the weather forcast for London. The header of the page and icon will change depending on if it's warm or cold
